attributes.additional_details:
Khaldoon Sinjab is an extraordinary man. You can read about his case here: http://goo.gl/Cocq4l.

This is important because he is just one of a countless number of vulnerable people. Ordinary people who care for their families and just try to do their job. Sadly, we live in a world where this hasn't been possible. Please, please grant this man and his family the right to live in the UK. For what he's gone through, he thoroughly deserves it.


Avaaz petition: https://goo.gl/U2SYJf
attributes.background: Firstly, there has already been a petition on the global petition site avaaz.org. Considering the government has no legal obligation to answer to any of these sites, I have decided to bring the issue here. If you've signed the Avaaz petition, please sign this to make your signature even more potent.
